greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = Product_{d|n, d>1, d = x^(2k-1) for some maximal k >= 1} prime(k).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
Index entries for sequences computed from exponents in factorization of n
program: (PARI) A294873(n) = { my(m=1,e); fordiv(n,d, if(d>1, e = ispower(d); if(!e, m += m, if((e>1)&&(e%2), m *= prime((e+1)/2))))); m; };
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Nov 11 2017
